Posts.Content: Jerseylicious wrote: To make a long story short, my chemo friend (going thru chemo with me, almost same regimen and schedule) ended up being admitted to hospital last nite bc she had a fever of 102....now they are saying she has an infection of unknown origin, her immune system is shutting down, and her WBC is 2. She is scared sick bc doctors can not get infection under control. What the heck! Like me, she is 7 days out from 2nd chemo. I told her I would come on here and ask for the expertise from all of u! I swear you know more than doctors! Please share any info with me at alll!!!! Dx 7/2/2011, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, 0/5 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: i need your help! Jerseylicious llm005
